Articles.Content:
Hello, this is a revival/ merging mod for a bunch of discontinued planet packs that lot's of people loved. 

The working download will not be here for a while, so please wait patiently for an update on how everything is working. It is technically called a pre alpha stage because I just started it.

Planets packs that I might revive/include: (non of these are guaranteed to be included, because these all work in 1.7x)

Arkas,

aspelicus,

Cavran

chani.

Anoughter reason it might not be done is because I'm one of the devs for XPCR and we are still doing updates for it.

Edited June 25, 2019 by Shawn Kerman
